title: Zams Gardenia - Green Township near IIT Patna
description: Zams Gardenia is a green, modern township on the outskirts of Patna in Bihta. This fast-growing area offers excellent connectivity with IIT Patna campus just 2 km away. Patna's Jai Prakash Narayan Airport is a short drive away, and a new civil enclave (future international airport) is planned at Bihta Air Force Station. Wide roads and utilities come standard, with upcoming shops and schools promising comfort and convenience.

title: Friends Colony Phase-1 - Gated Community Dehradun
description: Friends Colony Phase-1 is a welcoming, gated community in Sundarpur on Dehradun's northern outskirts. Located along Saharanpur Road (soon part of the Delhi-Dehradun Expressway), ensuring fast highway access to Delhi. Minutes from Graphic Era University and Selaqui Industrial Area. Features wide 20-25 ft roads, parks, and 24/7 security.

title: Bajrang Vatika - Ready-to-Move Green Township
description: Bajrang Vatika is a ready-to-move plot township on the 4-lane Shimla Bypass Road. Unbeatable connectivity - literally 1 minute from the Shimla Bypass. Only 5 minutes from Vivekananda Hospital and Doon Global School. Graphic Era University and other major institutions within 10-15 minutes. Developed roads, 24×7 electricity/water, parks and security.

title: Budget Plot near NH-48
description: Great location with all basic amenities nearby. Perfect for building your dream home.

title: Corner Plot in Gated Community
description: Premium corner plot in a well-developed gated community with 24/7 security.

title: Affordable Plot in Developing Area
description: Excellent investment opportunity in an upcoming area with planned infrastructure.
